entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sprague 11:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -23.2°C
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -25.5°C
Wind: NNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
